Key Match Events: India finished with 273 for 2 in 35 overs, chasing down Afghanistan's 272 for 8
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed pride in the team's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kishan and Kohli provided ideal support to Rohit Sharma
Jasprit Bumrah took a four-wicket haul
Others: The match was played at the Arun Jaitley Cricket Stadium in New Delhi
